title: Dead in the Water
lyrics:
Tired of being the good cop
I'm gonna do what I please
Don't hand me any more allegations
Of misconduct or sanction me
I got the world in my hands
Can make it rain or flood

I've got my fingers in all the pots

And toxic waste in my blood

In my blood



Don't try to look away

Or stop me in my path

I make the law and I decree

A new kind of wrath



Whenever I want, whatever I need

Wherever I go don't stop me

Whenever I want, whatever I need

If you try to resist or put up a fight

I'll take you and the whole world with me

You and the whole world with me

I'll take you and the whole world with me



I'll pick your pocket in plain daylight

And no one move a muscle

I got my eye on the prize

You're drowning in your lies



You and the whole world with me

I'll take you and the whole world with me

I'll take you and the whole world with me

I'll take you and the whole world with me
